review_title: Great cause, great charity, great people
pros:
Fantastic place to work amongst so many highly skilled and motivated people, all making a difference to the lives of animals. 
Brilliant team, everyone is so supportive.
Myself and my colleagues have received lots of training and access to career development. 
Budgets are small, but are used effectively to put animals and the team first.
cons:
Salaries aren’t great.
You have to drive to get there.

pros: accommodating, well run, great ethos, great cause
cons: a little slow to get things agreed

pros: Flexible with good pay for age
